text: i was valedictorian and expected to give an address. even now, i can remember that moment when i walked up to the podium and looked out at the crowd. there must have been thousands of people. my heart started pounding in my chest. i began to hyperventilate. my vision became blurry, and before i knew it... oh, dear.
